website_summaries.verdict: Superior engineering makes this canister vacuum a top choice. Edges out the competitors in terms of overall performance.
pros: Lightweight yet extremely powerful in terms of suction
Can tackle difficult areas thanks to the long cord reach
Great for all types of flooring, including hard floors
Miele is a highly trusted brand

customer_reviews.title: Perfect,light,quite,long cord,great suction
customer_reviews.text: I love this! I have severe back problems and this is perfect. It's very lightweight, I can carry it around easily. The auction is awesome, the attachments are all useful. I can even vacuum my sheep skin thick deep fur easily. Just as great on hard wood, perfect for stairs. The price is amazing for this high of quality. It's a very quiet vacuum, you can still hear phone and TV. I bought the white color. This is the perfect vacuum for disabled at an affordable price. Refreshing! 5*
customer_reviews.author: Shopaholic

customer_reviews.title: my second purchase of this model, love it.
customer_reviews.text: bought for my daughter and son in law for Christmas. my second one. this one is nice for hard surfaces. recommend buying the larger hard floor attachment, if you don't have a lot of rugs/carpets. Very quiet, light, stands upright to go down the stairs, and the light helps you see what's hiding under the bed, yikes!
customer_reviews.author: cwdrz

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful vacuum -- don't bank on the color though
customer_reviews.text: Phoenix Down's review covers everything, and really helped me decide on the Alize over the Calima. Bought a new turbobrush ( separately and couldn't be happier. I'd just like to add how impressed I am with the filters. Oh, and the product description claims this is 'Petrol' color, but despite dropping this much money on a vacuum I gather you get whatever they send. In my case it was 'Pacific Blue,' which is closer to green than blue. I don't care, but just FYI!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew F.

customer_reviews.title: great vacuum cleaner but floor scratcher
customer_reviews.text: It is my third Miele vacuum, each lasted over ten years. This one is as good as previous ones but attachment for hardwood floor is pure metal. See photo. As some other people wrote, it will scratch your hardwood floor. It is unbelievable that Miele will do this. I am using attachment from old vacuum cleaner, Miele Parquett Twister, so got lucky. Otherwise very good vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: Zorandinho

customer_reviews.title: It will last longer than I will.
customer_reviews.text: I thought my last Miele would last longer than I will; unfortunately a hired cleaner figured out a way to burn out the motor. The Miele engineers have taken that into account this time, and added safety features to avoid that problem. Now I'm sure that this Miele will last longer than I will.
customer_reviews.author: Old Granny

customer_reviews.title: Why did it take me so long to get this awesome vacuum
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for a couple of months. After years of having an okay vacuum cleaner, I finally broke down and purchased the Miele 3 vacuum. I have all hardwood floors and only carpet on my stairs. I also purchased the large Miele SBB 400-3 Parquet Twister XL Smooth Floor Brush. The vacuum is easy to maneuver, slides gracefully around. The Parquet Twister lays about flat so you can maneuver under beds, dressers, and cabinets. Suction is adjustable and very good. After years of lugging around the old upright the Miele is a breeze to handle. Again, I only ask myself, what took me so long to purchase a good vacuum!!! Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: ElizRea

customer_reviews.title: Extremely powerful unit
customer_reviews.text: Mostly great!!! Suction is exceptional, and that makes it perfect on hard floors. It DOES fit under low furniture very well. On carpet, it’s not as easy to move. It mostly works (because of the powerful suction), but a power head would work even better. Not that easy to move as a unit with a powered rotating brush in the head. Also, the light is at the handle where you hold it. Doesn’t light extremely well, but it’s not bad. If the hose had a power line for a power head, then the light could be on the head itself, and that would be much more functional. That’s why 4 stars and not 5.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Wolfert

customer_reviews.title: Light Weight and Quiet
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe I spent this much money on a vacuum, but it was totally worth it. The Miele is quiet, light weight and very easy to pull around. Also, the head pivots to go around furniture legs and makes vacuum as pleasurable as it possibly can be (which is still awful, but slightly less awful). I wasn't crazy about the color of the vacuum, but what I really care about is functionality and the Miele excels there. One thing I really like about this model is the heppa filter and light on the handle area of the vacuum. The light is great because it puts light into corners and under furniture that would otherwise be dark. Good feature!
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Not What They Used To Be
customer_reviews.text: Save your money! I had my previous Miele for 20+ years. This new model was cheaply made in comparison. The hose connecting the wand with the canister kept coming out of the canister - the design was poor and made of flimsy material. Suction power was good but, with the hose issue not worth the aggravation. Very disappointing. Returned unit this morning.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING PRODUCT!
customer_reviews.text: I bought a Dyson vacuum like 1.5 years ago and spent $1,000 so I was hesitant to buying a new one but it was so annoying not to be able to vacuum our wood floors properly, and doubling the effort. This product was recommended by our in/out housekeeper from another client, and it has been amazing. Frost it costs half $500, and it works perfectly. Suction, mobility and easiness to handle are fantastic. Great on floors and for rugs you just have to change the mode with one button and that is it. Great product. Very happy with it. I threw away the Dyson which is a shame because it had no repair.
customer_reviews.author: Jillian

customer_reviews.title: Great vacuum! Could use a longer power cord and ...
customer_reviews.text: Great vacuum! Could use a longer power cord and just a little smaller head to clear under some cabinets. Would definitely recommend! Super easy to use and has great power features. Love the on board tools and retractable cord!
customer_reviews.author: PBeane

customer_reviews.title: Pretty much the same thing happens
customer_reviews.text: I'll write a proper review later. First, I'm hoping to get help with an issue. The light is not and has never worked properly. When I first put in the batteries, the light remained on, even when I pushed the on/off switch. I fiddled with it for awhile to no avail. I came back to it a few weeks later and put the batteries in again. Pretty much the same thing happens, except sometimes the lights blink when I move the handle. I'm wondering if there is a faulty wire connection. I want to exchange the machine for one that works, but can not find the exchange or return option on my order. Please advise.
customer_reviews.author: tinabell

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: The quiet, the suction and the HEPA filtration and bagging. It's just nice. The ergonomic ease of use and just general fit and finish is all what you'd expect from a company that cares about the people who end up using their products.
customer_reviews.author: carpenter

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with our new Miele
customer_reviews.text: The vac works very well on our hardwood floors and on the area rugs. It is so easy to move from place to place and is amazingly quiet - not even my skiddish cockapoo minds it; she alway ran and hid from our old vacuum. It also works well in my office which is carpeted. It is very easy to use to dust the the top of my rol-top desk, and the high shelving. I am very pleased
customer_reviews.author: smokyspaniel55

customer_reviews.title: Defective Machine
customer_reviews.text: Machine is broken. Handle is missing cover. Vacuum head is defective. Very dissapointed. Will try 2 shop for replacements but may return
customer_reviews.author: BrightonFun1

customer_reviews.title: I just love this vac...
customer_reviews.text: Well, going to start by saying...the least like category is out the window. I love, l know, how can you love a vac cleaner, but l do. I wish l had had this Miele vac ages ago. It is easy to handle and rides on my hardwood floors like a dream. The suction on it is beyond superb. I am very happy with my purchase...
customer_reviews.author: Nil

customer_reviews.title: This Miele is really great! Best vacuum I ever had
customer_reviews.text: This Miele is really great! Best vacuum I ever had. I decided to get it despite the fact that products sometimes are different online than when you finally receive them in hand. So, I took the risk, and guess what? I was pleasantly surprised. The quality is excellent for the price. The packaging is excellent and protects it during shipping. I also received it faster than I expected! Please note that I received this product at a discounted price in exchange for an honest review. Despite the discounted price, I have not allowed the opinions expressed in this review to be affected. Therefore, I have consistently made sure my review remains balanced and accurate. Thanks for reading.
customer_reviews.author: Quester92

customer_reviews.title: Not good for dog hair in carpets
customer_reviews.text: Bare floors-phenomenal suction. Carpet: suction is great but no rotating brush to pick up dog hair! Disappointing, difficult and tiring to complete that kind of cleaning. Far too expensive for this level of cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: Ingrid W

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but costly!
customer_reviews.text: This thing works great. Just make sure that you're getting everything you want when you buy it! If you need a motorized carpet brush, this isn't it, check and see, and check a local dealer first, they might meet or give you a lower price and make sure you get what you want and need.
customer_reviews.author: christina m foster

customer_reviews.title: It is a beautiful machine, very quiet
customer_reviews.text: It is a beautiful machine, very quiet. We have mostly hardwood floors and low pile carpets so that it works very well for us.
customer_reviews.author: silvana

customer_reviews.title: Great for People with Allergies and Asthma
customer_reviews.text: I need a compact vacuum with HEPA filter to reduce allergens on walls and ceiling. With the soft bristle attachment, it did great job. Very well designed machine
customer_reviews.author: Frank G. Jacques

customer_reviews.title: This is the right choice fore > 70% bare floors
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum is everything I wanted it to be and more. Its very quiet, and perfect for wood and tile floors. No scratches what so ever with the attachment. The handle is extremely comfortable, a big step up from the other models. This has premium features only found on the highest end models with electric heads. Note: We onlyuse this on our bare floors, the mode for carpets is poor, dont even bother. If you need to use it with carpets get a powered brush. Dont even bother with the airpowered ones honestly. We just use our Hoover Platinum for our carpeting.
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: better wheels, better attachments
customer_reviews.text: This is the 2nd Miele for me. It's improvements from my 14 year old vacuum are well thought out. A place to hang the extension, better wheels, better attachments, more bells and whistles and a lighter weight. It's my new dancing partner!
customer_reviews.author: Elisabeth Smith

customer_reviews.title: really great vacuum cleaner
customer_reviews.text: love this cleaner! Quiet and efficient. Only disappointment is that the on/off control is on the canister, which makes it awkward when you're cleaning book shelves near the ceiling....
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Stoddard

customer_reviews.title: Worth the cost
customer_reviews.text: Great suction and design. Very lightweight and great features ! Just traveled to Austria and everyone there has a Miele and they last a very long time
customer_reviews.author: Bridget Tippett

customer_reviews.title: Nothing like a Miele!
customer_reviews.text: Dependable Miele value and quality. Don’t bother with the “other” brand. My last Miele lasted 20 years, theirs didn’t make it 20 months.
customer_reviews.author: Karen A.

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: My last one lasted 20 years and this one works amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Kiki Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to handle. Great suction power and beautiful design. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Elena Kravchenko

customer_reviews.title: Worth the Price!
customer_reviews.text: Okay, I checked "Love" this. Who the heck loves a vacuum? I do! This machine is the best on the market. It's cute, it's quiet, its lightweight, and it cleans. What's not to love? P.S. This is my second Miele vacuum. The first one's still going even after 20 years of hard use and never a service, but I've relegated it to the lower half of the house. I use them to clean a 4,000 sq.ft. home, they're used twice a week, so both get a workout.
customer_reviews.author: Compassionata

customer_reviews.title: It's like an air purifier and vacuum cleaner in one
customer_reviews.text: This thing takes no prisoners. It's like an air purifier and vacuum cleaner in one.
customer_reviews.author: DRN

customer_reviews.title: has great suction, easy to pull around
customer_reviews.text: has great suction,easy to pull around. one draw back, 0n and off switch should be on where you hold it to operate.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great all around cleaner!
customer_reviews.text: Has been great for hardwood floors, area rugs, baseboard, windows. I love how easy it is to keep my house clean! Great home vacuum cleaner.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie Keefe

customer_reviews.title: A very reliable vacuum
customer_reviews.text: I just love this vacuum, it is light and the suction is unbelievable!
customer_reviews.author: pixie

customer_reviews.title: not worth the money and cannot get a refund from Amazon
customer_reviews.text: Worst vacuum for hardwood flooring. I returned the vacuum to Amazon and 2 weeks now, with no refund.
customer_reviews.author: Marc

customer_reviews.title: Most amazing vacuum
customer_reviews.text: I have a central vac system in my home and was not happy with it at all. I purchased this vacuum and could not be happier. I have mostly wood flooring and use the additional tool for wood flooring. I would not use the multi purpose tool that comes with the vacuum I think this would eventually scratch the flooring. I do use the multi purpose tool for my slate flooring. I can easily lift this to do stairs and haul in and out of its storage place. I have used the Miele Complete C3 for 7 months without an issue. I highly recommend Miele vacuums.
customer_reviews.author: CMM

customer_reviews.title: and this vacuum is awesome. After having gone through several battery operated brands
customer_reviews.text: Our house is almost all hardwood floors, and this vacuum is awesome. After having gone through several battery operated brands, including a dyson, this vacuum has been the best. Great suction, versatile and quiet. I am very happy with my purchase so far.
customer_reviews.author: jj

customer_reviews.title: Great quality. Very satisfied with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised. Great quality. Very satisfied with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Lflatilla

customer_reviews.title: Great unit
customer_reviews.text: This is a great vacuum cleaner. It is so silent and has so much power. Love it
customer_reviews.author: Bond

customer_reviews.title: Nice job on hardwood and tile floors
customer_reviews.text: Nice job on hardwood and tile floors. Canister glides easily. Does not work well on low pile carpets and scatter rugs. Nothing beats a power head for carpet. An improvement to the design would be a foot release for the head.
customer_reviews.author: Anne Clarkson

customer_reviews.title: Quiet, Clean, and Effective but....
customer_reviews.text: The little push button light with batteries does not work. Why, ask a Chinese person who assembled it or maybe they forgot to steal that particular part of the technology, i.e. how to make a light bulb work by push button. O.K., having said that the vacuum is quiet, effective and does not emit unpleasant odors or particles back into the room because of its very excellent filtering system. On Automatic setting, it pulses to high suction to less depending on the situation. So far we both really like the thing. It does generate heat quickly, so we are concerned about the longevity of the motor. But, will update this review after a period of usage.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: The best!
customer_reviews.text: A great vacuum cleaner! Quiet, easy to use and powerful. The best we've had!
customer_reviews.author: sdwilliams201

customer_reviews.title: A very well made and versatile vacuum cleaner
customer_reviews.text: A high quality and versatile vacuum cleaner. Used it for cleaning up after a recent major remodeling job (lots of fine dust from tile removal and wall sanding). The unit worked very well in vacuuming various surfaces, including curtain, lamp shades, blinds, bed, furniture, rug, and hard floor. It was highly effective in vacuuming fine dust (has built in HEPA filter) and made the clean up process much easier than we anticipated. The SUB 20 universal brush is highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: ST

customer_reviews.title: If it's possible to love a vacuum cleaner
customer_reviews.text: If it's possible to love a vacuum cleaner, that's how much I adore my new Miele. Great on wood floors, great attachments, awesome with pet hair. Expensive but worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Foxtrot

customer_reviews.title: so far very pleased. Used to have a Dyson
customer_reviews.text: Worth the money, so far very pleased. Used to have a Dyson....so frustrated with lack of suction. This Miele C3 is everything I needed, very happy. Good quality!
customer_reviews.author: CDuvall

customer_reviews.title: A Dream Machine
customer_reviews.text: I love my new vacuum cleaner. It is so quiet, maneuvers like a dream & cleans my tile & hardwood floors effortlessly. Can't believe I didn't buy it sooner.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: this is the best vacuum EVER
customer_reviews.text: What can I say!?....this is the best vacuum EVER!!!! Look no further.
customer_reviews.author: Fishing lady

customer_reviews.title: WORTH IT
customer_reviews.text: Raise your hand if you want to spend over $600.00 for a vacuum cleaner. I didn't either.I did a lot of research before I bought this model. I am completely satisfied. It is worth the price. Powerful and quiet.No dirt smell emitted as you vacuum. Lightweight. Easy to maneuver. I have owned Hoover Wind Tunnel upright, bagless, and canister. I have developed allergies and need something "better." Miele makes great products. If you consider this brand, check out: handle, bag size, HEPA filter, on-board tools.
customer_reviews.author: Barker

customer_reviews.title: this will scratch your hardwood floors
customer_reviews.text: just a warning for anyone considering purchasing this vacuum. i used the vacuum on auto setting and it unfortunately caused a large scratch on my hardwood floors. i used this setting as i thought it would be best for going in-between area rugs and hardwood. i guess the suction is so strong it caused the metal on the bottom of the vacuum wand to scratch my floors. seriously disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Sara bogart

customer_reviews.title: Floor/carpet attachment is worthless!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this vacuum for the office when the old one died. I have this exact same machine for my home. I gave this a 3 star because of the carpet /floor cleaning attachment. It is completely useless. It's very small and hangs up on low pile carpeting I had to go back online and order a powered unit.
customer_reviews.author: Debidooneni

customer_reviews.title: Alize - Green Color - Good Product - Floor Attachment are ok, but not great
customer_reviews.text: The floor attachment for the Alize has a two position buttom for hard floor and for low pile carpet. I don't care for the attachment, so I ordered a separate floor attachment and separate carpet attachment. The floor attachment works great; I had to turn-down the suction control to allow better sweeping control. I've tried the turbo carpet a little; too early to really know how it performs, but seems to be considerably better than the two-position, floor attachment that came with the Alize. Rather than buy the Alize, I would look for the Complete C3 model that comes with the two separate floor heads; but not the models that have the electric power-head.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: this is the best. If you have a lot of wall-to-wall or ...
customer_reviews.text: Read all the reviews and comparisons, but if you have a mix of hardwood floors and rugs and need to be able to go seamlessly from one to the other, this is the best. If you have a lot of wall-to-wall or deep pile carpet, check out the other ones.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Bov

customer_reviews.title: love my new alize!!
customer_reviews.text: I just purchased the Alize in the green petrol color. It is a deep teal color, lovely! This vacuum places an 8 year old tired nasty bagless Dyson upright. Our house has 90% wood and laminate floors, so the Alize was the perfect choice for me. I also like that it has some features beyond the similar priced calima. I purchased the carpet attachment separate for some rugs we have since we have a shepherd pup who sheds a decent amount. This vacuum does not disappoint and makes cleaning my floors not such a dreaded task now. I can clean more efficiently and have spare time for mopping as well. Love this vacuum!!!
customer_reviews.author: B. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Buy for life.
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum is built like a tank and will last you a lifetime, as long as you treat it right. Best bang for the buck when it comes to Miele's product line. It has many sophisticated features that you will only find on higher end models, and you can add accessories if you find the combination floor tool unsatisfactory. I highly recommend purchasing the parquet twister if you have a lot of hardwood flooring.
customer_reviews.author: SungJune Park

customer_reviews.title: I love this vacuum for hard surfaces
customer_reviews.text: I love this vacuum for hard surfaces! It doesn't work great on rugs and carpet but I think I will invest in the turbo head to help with that. We have a Golden Retriever and a corgi mix so we have hair everywhere! This vacuum picks it up so much better than our Dyson upright did. The wheels are super smooth and my girls (4 and 6) love to use it, too! It is also great for cleaning out a vehicle. I shopped for a new vacuum for 3 months and am super happy with my decision!
customer_reviews.author: Stacy

customer_reviews.title: BEST vacuum we have ever owned (and we had all the big names)
customer_reviews.text: Quiet - the wife can vacuum with me watching TV and I am not bothered! Power - picks up everything if you have the nozzle set right. Cord length - one outlet does almost the whole first level. Ease of use - the slide adjustable wand and foot controls make operational use much easier than other vacs. You will love it.
customer_reviews.author: George S. Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: I love having a canister again
customer_reviews.text: For the price I don't think this vacuum is worth it. I love having a canister again, but I often have to go over the same spot more than once. It is ok on hardwood but not so great on tiled floors and even worse on low pile carpets.
customer_reviews.author: Noname

customer_reviews.title: Good on wood & low pile rugs.
customer_reviews.text: Love the suction on wood & low pile indoor/outdoor carpet, but the pole is kind of heavy/awkward, there’s warm exhaust airflow yhat sometimes smells bad. Also, bags are small & need to be replaced more often than my large Kirby bags. However Kirby bags are more expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki Curtis

customer_reviews.title: The Suction is Phenomenal
customer_reviews.text: The best vacuum cleaner I have ever owned. The suction is excellent. It's easy to maneuver and it doesn't weigh a lot. The hose length is great! It allows me to reach my 10 foot ceiling without having to pick up the cannister or stand it on its end.
customer_reviews.author: ill

customer_reviews.title: Make sure you know the floorhead type you need
customer_reviews.text: Make sure you understand this vacuum only has a suction floorhead. If you need a brush floorhead, you must order one. If you need the electrobrush floorhead, you will need to upgrade wand and hose. We have 3 dogs and require the electrobrush floorhead. We have repackaged and returned because it’s cheaper to order a canister vacuum with the electrobrush. Otherwise, product is probably OK.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Very light and easy to use vacuum cleaner
customer_reviews.text: Pros. Very light and easy to use vacuum cleaner. Quality materials. Seems sturdy enough. Fits easily into a closet when not being used. Easy to replace the used bag with a new one. Cons. Expensive. Accessories do not include the turbo brush. Picks up most of the cat hair off a short pile carpet, but not all of it. Overall happy with a purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: I love this Miele vacuum model so much
customer_reviews.text: I love this Miele vacuum model so much, I bought another...the light on the wand is indispensable when cleaning in cupboards & under beds. I like the auto setting & the other different suction options. The machine moves quietly upon it's wheels from various levels of tile, grout & wood flooring.
customer_reviews.author: KorenAllyn

customer_reviews.title: Great vaccum
customer_reviews.text: My wife has used this and I have not gotten a shot at it yet. My wife says this is the best vaccum she has ever used. Light and easy to move even cleaned our carpeted steps with this. She loves it.
customer_reviews.author: David C. Hanzelman

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: Best vacuum I've ever owned. I had another Miele and that was good too, but this one even blows that one away. It feels like it will suck the chrome off a bumper. The tools in the canister makes it very organized and convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa H.

customer_reviews.title: Great for hardwood only.
customer_reviews.text: It would not vacuum a rug. I had no idea.
customer_reviews.author: C. GIbson

customer_reviews.title: Suction is unreal!
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum is unbelievable! It has suction that you can adjust. It cleans like nothing I’ve ever owned. This will be the only vacuum I’ll own com here on out.
customer_reviews.author: Beate Jordan

customer_reviews.title: This is my 3rd Miele, two for me, ...
customer_reviews.text: This is my 3rd Miele, two for me, one for my daughter. I never thought I'd pay this much to vacuum, but once you've experienced a Miele, you'll understand.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy S.

customer_reviews.title: so happy we went with model Complete C3
customer_reviews.text: Our first Miele vacuum; so happy we went with model Complete C3; absolutely love it.
customer_reviews.author: G. S. Andriate

customer_reviews.title: One of the best canister vacuums around - expensive
customer_reviews.text: One of the best canister vacuums around - expensive - read directions carefully
customer_reviews.author: J. Goldberg

customer_reviews.title: The best vacuum ever
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum has helped to get rid of “stuff” that was making my allergies worse
customer_reviews.author: Mitzi Love

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.text: An upgrade from my previous Miele. My ex wife took the previous one at the split, so I HAD to get another one!
customer_reviews.author: F. Chen

customer_reviews.title: love it but had to buy a different floor brush ...
customer_reviews.text: love it but had to buy a different floor brush which works well and is lower profile; i talk to people about how much i love this vacuum!
customer_reviews.author: p watson

customer_reviews.title: This is the most amazing vacuum I have ever owned
customer_reviews.text: This is the most amazing vacuum I have ever owned! It is worth every penny. The suction is powerful and it is easy to switch vacuum modes while vacuuming. The attachments are easy to change and everything fits neatly into the vacuum compartments. The bag and filter are easy to change. Love this vacuum!
customer_reviews.author: Wright Family

customer_reviews.title: Works awesome. I hate to say it
customer_reviews.text: Works awesome. I hate to say it, but it makes vacuuming fun! It's amazing how easy it is to use. Very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Ac

customer_reviews.title: The most reliable product.
customer_reviews.text: My 17 year old Miele died recently. I didn't even bother looking for a different brand. Miele vacuum never turn me down.
customer_reviews.author: Kai

customer_reviews.title: Would highly recommend this vacuum
customer_reviews.text: Would highly recommend this vacuum. It is so quiet and picks up all the pet hair, dust, etc. Well made and worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent product and respected brand. We have two in our home.
customer_reviews.author: cactus jane

product_meta.title: Miele Complete C3 Alize, Petrol
product_meta.description: Color:PetrolThe Miele C3 Alize is a perfect synergy of design and functionality, Miele's C3 series sets new standards in floor care. Superior engineering is balanced with carefully-selected, fine quality materials such as a durable stainless steel wand and specialized ABS plastic with a hard, impact-resistant surface. The C3 series features innovative skeleton construction. Other conveniences include a 36-foot operating radius and foot pedal controls for quick and effective cleaning. C3 also features a silence motor to maintain a quiet environment, and an AirClean Sealed System that not only vacuums your floors - but also cleans the air your family breathes. Miele's C3 Alize vacuum cleaner features an AirTeQ Combination floor tool ideal for cleaning low pile carpeting, rugs and smooth flooring. The AirTeQ has streamlined airflow for uninterrupted floor contact as you switch from smooth flooring to carpeting. Alize offers a savvy, self-adjusting Automatic setting. As you transition from hardwoods to carpeting, the Alize automatically decreases suction, then increases suction when you return to smooth, solid flooring - saving you both time and energy. A telescopic, stainless steel wand and long electrical cord, with one-touch automatic rewind, provide a total cleaning radius of 36 feet. The C3 Alize is also equipped with a Deluxe Comfort Grip handle with LED headlight and six-stage suction controls, plus Automatic setting, via a +/- foot switch. Other conveniences include three integrated accessories - a dusting brush, upholstery tool and crevice nozzle - and a 3D bumper. For especially comfortable handling-With lever action: The floorhead can be easily manoeuvred thanks to the flexible hose connector. Practical locking system-Nothing comes loose: Floorhead, Telescopic Suction Wand and handle lock into each other with an acoustic fit. Comfort cable rewind with single-touch control-Extra quick and convenient: The entire cable can be rewound by simply tapping the footswitch. DynamicDrive swivel castors-Protects your floors: Rubberized wheels and swivel castors with shock absorbers ensure a quiet driving experience.
